perturbation.original_text:
ALL DISPUTES ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE SETTLED VIA BINDING ARBITRATION ACCORDING TO THE RULES
AND REGULATIONS SET FORTH BY THE AMERICAN ARBITRATION ASSOCIATION IN SAN DIEGO COUNTY , THE STATE OF
CALIFORNIA.
perturbation.changed_text: ALL DISPUTES ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE SETTLED VIA ARBITRATION.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the reference to 'BINDING ARBITRATION ACCORDING TO THE RULES AND REGULATIONS SET FORTH BY THE AMERICAN ARBITRATION ASSOCIATION IN SAN DIEGO COUNTY, THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA', the modified text creates ambiguity. While arbitration is still mandated, the specific rules and location are no longer defined. This contradicts the intent of having a clear, enforceable dispute resolution process. The lack of specific rules and location makes the arbitration clause vague and potentially unenforceable, which undermines the purpose of the clause.
